trends: There have been no other sightings in Idyllwild-Pine Cove
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: sighting detailsmy 23 year old son went to idyllwild, ca. this weekend 07\15\2013 and sent this picture to me and i noticed this object can not be the sun cause the shadows of the sun do not face towards the viewer of the picture so i thought i should send it to mufon to try and decide.
Summary: My 23 year old son took this picture of what appears to be a UFO in Idyllwild, CA.
